fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Bonk someone on the head each night, roleblocking them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If someone is bonked, doesn't have defense and is not Town, they will be turned into an (86) Amnesiac that keeps the target's win condition and gains the attribute "You will keep your current win condition when you remember."
- You may bonk yourself.
- Roleblock immune
- You have a Basic autovest.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the Town lose the game.
